replyText:
Wire app seamlessly aligns with your system settings, enabling it to inherit the system's dark mode preference. Therefore, when you activate dark mode on your device, Wire will automatically switch to dark mode as well.

If you have any more questions, contact us: https://support.wire.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Wire Support

We are working on a fix. Contact us for more at https://support.wire.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I have a high-end device so it's definitely not related to this. ***UPDATE*** Came back to inevitably lower the rating further since this new app is absolute trash. Missed very important notifications that made me lose money already.

replyText:
We appreciate the time taken to provide this feedback.
The new app is running on a completely new code base, which enables better performance and more reliability. For users to benefit from the enhanced stability, we had to disable a few features that are loved by our users, however they will all come back soon.
Wire Support Team
text: The latest update makes the app useless. Lost all previous conversations and lost the biometric login. No more security from prying eyes........
After the last update the read notifications are gone. Please return them back. The last update made the app worse. The UI degraded. Seems it's time for me to migrate on alternatives.
this new UI is terrible! Why?

The most recent update is not good. I had conversations in groups pretty much disappear, except my own comments. I had a group that was empty and I had left suddenly re-appear and I cannot get rid of it. What is the deal?

What a great app clean 🛀 and a well built development and design 🎨 Well done as this company is based in Switzerland 🇨🇭 and has the world 🌎 best privacy 🔐 and thanks im mow learning whatsapp for good.
Can't log back in... Saying "credident incorrect" but when I try "creating" a new account it says email already in use
This app was good until rebuild! Where is the pin?! Or biometric lock?! Wt...?! U cant hide notifications, it will show all content!! Or u must turn it off! What was this rebuild really?!
Today update on 10. May ruin everthing good in this app

replyText:
Please note that we wanted to let you know that we are committed to continuously updating and improving our application with new features and enhancements.

We are working to bring back these features in future releases of the app. We appreciate your patience and understanding during this transition period.

Thanks
Wire Customer Support
text: Update has been bungled can get texts from my most used contact! Valued festures like timed texts and gifs are gone and no specific timeline on their return. May have to use another app until fixed. Also sharing is broken and have to do tedious copy and pasting of links! Let us know whe it's fixed but until then with be using others apps.

Please bring back old features. Missing that your can't do voice messages, haven't tested video calls just see a phone icon. Can't view sent pics and videos easily without scrolling. Can't archive old conversations for a clean look.

Just updated today and IT IS TERRIBLE. Folders, gone. Separate panels for contacts & conversions, gone. Archived contacts, returned. Exited groups, returned. Support page makes it clear Android users are getting the shaft, with functionality "returning" in 2023. What. The. Frak.

What on earth were you thinking with this update???????? You took away so many features!!! Why???? The last version was "usable by everyone," so that's non-sense! Ugh!!! The literal ONLY improvement is the permanent time-stamp that I have been requesting for like 5-years, but other than that noooooooooo everything is gone and changed and this is like going back to 2010. Omg no. Draw pad gone, voice recording gone, location sending gone, timing msgs to expire gone, GIFs gone??????? Noooooooo
No incoming messages. No self deleting messages!!

replyText:
Dark mode is currently linked to your system settings, meaning if your system is in dark mode the app will be too.

Please note that we wanted to let you know that we are committed to continuously updating and improving our application with new features and enhancements.

Thanks
Wire Customer Support
text: No dark mode. Horrendous for those with migraines. No formatting messages anymore either or liking messages. Edit to developers reply: my system doesn't support dark mode. I rely on Apps to have the setting to circumvent this. It worked better before when my profile pic chose the background as I could keep it dark.

Few things: 1. Message doesn't sends. 2. cannot hide inactive user chat. 3. Where dark theme. 4. Can't delete friend 5. Setting ??? 6. Took some time for "receiving new messages"(around 2min) before i received a messages. 7. Share link from other browser to wire doesnt work,(send button grey color). 8. Is this beta build? 9. Please downgrade to version before this. (Until atleast the app not buggy). 10. Dont fix things that doesnt broken

I've been using Wire since 2016 and always liked it because of the decent desktop client and simplicity of use. It always felt like it was aimed at small businesses, which is why I don't understand how a client with a lot LESS features can be released as a stable version (even though more buggy). How was there no rollback?!? That was a horrible business decision and no sane dev would feel comfortable with this. It's been a ride, but I'm going to jump ship at the earliest convenience... :(

replyText:
Hi,

Thank you for the feedback. We are sorry to hear that you're having issues with the app. We'd like to improve. Can you tell us more about what went wrong at https://support.wire.com/hc/en-us/requests/new ?

We look forward to your feedback.

Thanks,
Wire Support Team
text: Just says 'waiting for network' all the time. All my other apps connect to the network with no problem. Can't be bothered with this.

Was not too bad [only on WiFi] until the May 2nd update which changed the app look and behavior entirely. Ironicly now they date the last update as 2022. Even on WiFi after having been off-line for a few hours it won't load the missed messages for some time. The previous look was far cleaner too. Another app where they throw something against the wall and hope it sticks...

replyText:
Please note that we wanted to let you know that we are committed to continuously updating and improving our application with new features and enhancements.

We are working to bring back these features in future releases of the app. We appreciate your patience and understanding during this transition period.

Thanks
Wire Customer Support
text: the new update makes work slower. setting for notifications tone is not there and upon update it changes to my phone system default tone, which confuses me with other apps that I use. also can't quickly tap to like a message anymore, but need to hold and select from a range of reactions. Very unnecessary as this is not a leisure chat app where u need to think what emoji to use.

New version suckssssss!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Literally all the feature that made me love this app has been stripped away And the greatest crime of all, is that I can't send vn anymore . It really sucks because this was my alternative to WhatsApp

replyText:
Hello,

You can go to Settings -> Backup and Restore conversations -> Save the back up to a local folder which should show up in the apps that pop up when you try to save the file.If you are facing a specific issue then please raise a ticket and we will be happy to look into it - https://support.wire.com/hc/en-us

Thanks
Wire Customer Support
text: Excellent, especially the security. The possibility of backing up chats locally and restoring them is great. Edit: I am trying to restore a backup but there is no restore button. Furthermore if I try to back up, the backup feature only offers my contacts as the backup destination. This is stupid and frustrating. Why would I want to I want to send a backup file to one of my contacts? Removing 2 stars until this is fixed.
